description: This source file implements checkpoint and resume functionalities for processes, including functions 'HibernateProcess' and 'WakeupProcess', and handles process metadata management.

methods.name: uint32_t HibernateProcess(const uint32_t timeout,const pid_t pid,const char data_dir[],const char volatile_dir[],void ** storage)
methods.description: Puts a process into hibernation by creating a checkpoint and storing metadata.

methods.name: uint32_t WakeupProcess(const uint32_t timeout,const pid_t pid,const char data_dir[],const char volatile_dir[],void ** storage)
methods.description: Wakes up a process from hibernation by resuming from stored checkpoint metadata.
